statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ 14 \\ 7 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ 23 \\ 12 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 34 \\ 22 \\ 6 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
